GSD.description:
mm/kmemleak: avoid scanning potential huge holes

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.8 by commit cebb0aceb21ad91429617a40e3a17444fabf1529. For more details please see the references link.
